long_description: Portable with plenty of space and cooking power, the Coleman NXT 50 Tabletop Grill is ready to cook up ribs or veggies on your next camping trip, tailgate party or beach BBQ. Collapses and travels anywhere; lid latches for easy transport. 168 sq. in. of cooking space; 8,500 BTUs of power. Porcelain-coated steel grates provide consistent cooking performance. Operates on 16.4-oz. propane canisters, not included. Due to flammable item shipping restrictions, we cannot sell fuel canisters online; they are available at REI retail stores.
short_description: Portable with plenty of space and cooking power, the Coleman NXT 50 Tabletop Grill is ready to cook up ribs or veggies on your next camping trip, tailgate party or beach BBQ.
